title: Actor collisions example doesn't work with custom trajectories

content.raw:
Pull request #2875 added an example plugin which enables actor collisions. That works well for actors scripted through SDF, but when using custom trajectories, the collision poses are not updated and the physics thinks they're all on the world origin.

I'm using custom trajectories the [same way](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/43aba69517080eeaa792990795dc7ed72913928c/plugins/ActorPlugin.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ActorPlugin.cc-205) as in `ActorPlugin`. I tried `SetWorldPose(pose, true, true)` and that makes the actor jump around, while the collisions remain in the origin.
content.html:
Pull request #2875 added an example plugin which enables actor collisions. That works well for actors scripted through SDF, but when using custom trajectories, the collision poses are not updated and the physics thinks they're all on the world origin.

I'm using custom trajectories the same way as in ActorPlugin. I tried SetWorldPose(pose, true, true) and that makes the actor jump around, while the collisions remain in the origin.
